title: ClearMind Mobile App
description:
A mobile app that helps college students manage procrastination through
        interactive Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) activities, mindfulness
        exercises, and goal tracking.

title: WISE: Domain-Aware Data Science Assistant
description:
A prototype LLM-based system that supports novice data scientists by providing
        domain context explanations, helping them interpret unfamiliar datasets more effectively.

title: DataJam Outreach Program
description:
An outreach program connecting high school students with data science mentors.
        Focuses on promoting computational thinking and social good through hands-on projects.

title: Collective Emotional Intelligence Study
description:
A research project investigating how group emotional intelligence influences
        teamwork, stress management, and procrastination behaviors in academic settings.

title: MLflow + SageMaker Integration
description:
A cloud infrastructure project that integrates MLflow with Amazon SageMaker to automate
        experiment tracking, model deployment, and infrastructure management using AWS CDK.

title: Metacognition Web Tool
description:
A web-based platform designed to help students reflect on their learning processes
        through structured self-assessment prompts and visual analytics dashboards.
